name: Polyester-epoxy-urethane adhesives formulated from: 1. Polyester resins described in 21 CFR 177.1390(c)(2)(v)(a). 1,6-Hexanediol may also be used as an optional polyhydric alcohol. 2. Optional epoxy resin listed in 21 CFR 175.300(b)(3)(viii)(a) and comprising up to 30 percent by weight of the cured adhesive. 3. Urethane cross-linking agent, as described in 21 CFR 177.1390(c)(2)(v)(c). 4. Optional trimethoxysilane coupling agents containing epoxy and/or ether groups not to exceed 3 percent by weight of the cured adhesive.
